com.mr_apps.androidbase.adapter

Class RecyclerItem<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mr_apps.androidbase.adapter.RecyclerItem<T>

  • public class RecyclerItem<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic class that models an item of the AbstractHeaderFooterAdapter
    Author:
    Mattia Ruggiero, Denis Brandi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecyclerItem(boolean header, T item, boolean footer)
      Constructor that takes parameters to determine if this item is an header or a footer, or is a "standard" item with generic content

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecyclerItem

        public RecyclerItem(boolean header,
            T item,
            boolean footer)
        Constructor that takes parameters to determine if this item is an header or a footer, or is a "standard" item with generic content
        Parameters:
        header - true if this item is an header, false otherwise
        item - the content of the item
        footer - true if this item is a footer, false otherwise
